web.title: Web Application
web.description: What are the important things on the website? Beautiful, Fast load, The lastest Technologies, Security, Suitable for your business? We can include it all to become your perfect website.

mobile.title:
Hybrid Mobile
Application
mobile.description: By Using Flutter, an open-source created by Google. We can make the professional Hybrid Applications (Android / iOS) for your business.

data.title: Data Science
data.description: Raw data is like rough diamonds that need some processes. We can transform your raw data to be the most beautiful and precious cut diamonds.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.description: Since 2020, Superdev has established as a startup company by experienced software engineers, who developed software for worldwide international companies and the Thailand government departments. The founder aims to create a hub of designer and developer for building high-quality and efficient software at a reasonable price.

thanksMessage.title: Thank you for your interest
thanksMessage.detail: ทีมงานของเราจะติดต่อหาคุณเร็วๆ นี้ หากต้องการติดต่ออย่างรวดเร็วกรุณาโทร +6685-809-1536 หรือ +6691-936-9626
